overview: Ginger Lannom has served the company since March of 2005, first as the Director of Human Resources and as the Facility Security Officer. Ginger oversees all day-to-day operations of the company to provide for safe, secure and efficient operations. Ginger has over thirteen years of experience as a consultant with the majority of this time serving the Federal government at the Department of Energy (DOE) and the National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA) in the areas of government policy management, cyber security, information technology capital planning, special security requirements, office management, Technical Integration and senior executive level review and reporting. Ginger brings a wealth of government expertise to the Digital ReasoningÂ® Systems management team.
